oriented.translation[0].definitions[0].d: giving a lot of time, effort, or attention to one particular thing
oriented.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A lot of the younger students don’t seem to be politically oriented at all.
The country’s economy is export oriented.
oriented.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if something is market-oriented, customer-oriented etc, it is developed or done to meet the market’s or the customer’s needs
oriented.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The country is moving toward a market-oriented economic model.
